content: vegabond hat by kelly mcclure this unisex hat is so cozy you may not want to take it off if you feel like wandering make sure this hat wanders off with you it is loose-fitting slouchy oh-so-warm and even reversible the sweet and simple detail around the brim is like a touch of icing on a cupcake this hat is knit in stockinette stitch making this a great hat for showing off a luxurious yarn or a favourite colour it also makes for perfect travel knitting this hat is knit from the bottom to the crown with a light fingering weight yarn stitches are then picked up around the trim in a second colour the hat is then knit identically a second time and tacked at the top this hat has three sizes and no visible seam bohoknits patterns 2014 © kelly mcclure bohoknits@live ca this
